name: R0: Concourse of Conquest
description:
On an island continent known as Eirea, an eternal war wages between humans. This conflict has been going on for centuries, on and off, a hot debate on how to use resources for the continued development of mankind at the center. Unknown to the people who reside on Eirea, however, a greater, more fated war is about to take place...

R0: Concourse of Conquest is a game made with a combination of original and RTP assets in SRPG Studio that plays much like somewhat older SRPGs, but with a lot of quality of life that keeps it up to speed with the current generation. A fluid experience with several modes of play, allowing you to choose between a casual, laid back adventure or a brutal fight for survival.

Along the way, join Laelynn Sinceritas, Princess and heir to the throne of the neutral country of St. Ronika, as she embarks on a journey to reunite with her father, and gets far more than she bargained for. Dragons, angels and secrets of the world of Eirea await in this story penned by a long time fantasy novel writer.

Current features:

  • 13 chapters detailing the journey of Laelynn and her army, which currently can grow to a size of 22 members.
  • A complex web of interpersonal relationships can be unearthed by using your party members together in battle. Unlock a multitude of 'support conversations' between almost every single pair combination.
  • A finely crafted and tuned progression system that carefully maintains a steady power for your army to keep the game challenging and fun.
  • 7 challenges unlocked after the main game to test the abilities of your army after you've exhausted the current story.
  • A comprehensive ranking system that judges your ability and rewards you for play well done, but never makes you feel like a failure.
  • Quality of life and polish in every corner of the game to make you feel like you're playing something more modern than what it appears.
